generator:
1 { topicOf(P, T) : topic(T) } 1 :- presentation(P).
1 { scheduled(P, R, Sl, D) : room(R), slot(Sl), day(D) } :- presentation(P).

hard_constraints.description: All event staff must comply with the policy that no more than one presentation occupies a specific room-time coordinate.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P1, R, Sl, D), scheduled(P2, R, Sl, D), P1 != P2.

hard_constraints.description: Each room is subject to a daily capacity limit; total scheduled sessions must not exceed three per day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: { scheduled(P, R, Sl, D) : presentation(P), slot(Sl) } 3 :- room(R), day(D).

hard_constraints.description: Operations policy forbids back-to-back room usage; rooms must remain vacant between consecutive sessions.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(_, R, Sl1, D), scheduled(_, R, Sl2, D), Sl1 = Sl2 - 1.

hard_constraints.description: Equipment compliance rule: AI and Cloud topics require hardware not available in Room 2; scheduling in this room is prohibited.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- scheduled(P, R, _, _), topicOf(P, T), T = "AI", -projector(R).
:- scheduled(P, R, _, _), topicOf(P, T), T = "Cloud", -projector(R).

hard_constraints.description: The facility manager has issued a restriction forbidding VR sessions from being held in Room 1.
Corporate distribution rules require IoT content to be spread across a minimum of three days.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
hasIoT(D) :- scheduled(P, _, _, D), topicOf(P, "IoT").
:- #count { D : hasIoT(D) } < 3.

hard_constraints.description: Spatial separation policy: AI and VR sessions are forbidden from sharing a physical room within the same calendar day.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- scheduled(P1, R, _, D), scheduled(P2, R, _, D), topicOf(P1, "VR"), topicOf(P2, "AI").

hard_constraints.description: Overlap limit policy: To ensure balanced attendance, no more than two presentations involving Cloud or IoT topics may occur simultaneously.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
cloudOrIoT(P, Sl, D) :- scheduled(P, _, Sl, D), topicOf(P, "Cloud").
cloudOrIoT(P, Sl, D) :- scheduled(P, _, Sl, D), topicOf(P, "IoT").
:- day(D), slot(Sl), #count { P : cloudOrIoT(P, Sl, D) } > 2.

hard_constraints.description: The early morning slot on Day 1 is strictly reserved for AI content in accordance with the opening ceremony guidelines.
Compliance mandate: The early afternoon session of Day 4 must be dedicated exclusively to VR presentations.
Standard engagement rules require that every scheduled day must feature at least one presentation.
To maintain topical diversity, every time slot must host a minimum of two distinct subject areas across the facility.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
hasTopic(T, Sl, D) :- scheduled(P, _, Sl, D), topicOf(P, T).
:- slot(Sl), day(D), #count { T : hasTopic(T, Sl, D) } < 2.

soft_constraints.description: Top-tier priority: Maximize the number of rooms utilized during each session to demonstrate high operational activity.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
used(R, Sl, D) :- scheduled(_, R, Sl, D).
roomsUsed(N, Sl, D) :- N = #count { R : used(R, Sl, D) }, slot(Sl), day(D).
#maximize { N@2 : roomsUsed(N, Sl, D) }.

soft_constraints.description: Secondary priority: Minimize global idle room-time slots to optimize facility overhead and resource efficiency.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
idle(R, Sl, D) :- room(R), slot(Sl), day(D), not used(R, Sl, D).
num_idle(N) :- N = #count{R, Sl, D: idle(R, Sl, D) }.
#minimize { N@1: num_idle(N) }.
